p: The dataset for the CCoAOMT model consists of Tbr wild-type and three CCoAOMT down-regulated lines (Li02, Li03, and Li04). The scree plot in Supporting Information, corresponding to non-pretreated CCoAOMT and Tbr samples, indicates the proportion of variance described by the first three principal components as 47.91%, 14.19% and 12.78% of the total variance. While for the case of pretreated CCoAOMT and Tbr control samples, the first three principal components account for 30.36%, 25.48% and 16.54% of the total variance ( Fig. 8a).
